1.speaker: A
sentence: Christmas is just around the corner.

2.speaker: B
sentence: I can't believe it's already the end of the year.
난 믿을 수가 없어 벌써 연말이라니

3.speaker: A
sentence: I deeply reflect on myself at this time of the year.
나 깊이 자신을 반성해 일 년 중 이맘때면.

4.speaker: B
sentence: Come on. you're on the right track.

5.speaker: A
sentence: From now on, I'll try not to live in the past.
지금부턴, 난 하지 않도록 할꺼야 과거에 연연하며 살다.

6.speaker: B
sentence: Ok. but you should take responsibility for your past.
그래. 하지만 너 책임을 져야해 너의 과거에.
